title: LEAGUE OF LEGENDS WONT OPEN !
body:
Every time I try to run league it just brings up the badge, after 10-15 seconds it disappears and nothing happens. Ive tried uninstalling and reinstalling, deleting lol launcher and lol patcher and running as admin. Nothing seems to work. When i run as admin it tires to repair the client, once it finishes it still does the same thing.
pls help riot

replies.body: Make sure you run through the other steps outlined in this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as well as running the client as admin. If those steps don't help at all, go ahead and hit up our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some deeper troubleshooting.
